thread.title: Mastodon Post Official Album Update, It's Weird [News]
thread.title_full: Mastodon Post Official Album Update, It's Weird [News]

title: Mastodon Post Official Album Update, It's Weird [News]
text:
Mastodon Post Official Album Update, It's Weird Not that you expected anything different, right? UG News editor since early 2013. King Crimson fan. I handle the news around here. Posted 12 hours ago 24 
Those Mastodon weirdos posted a weird update regarding the new album, kinda confirming it's all done and set for release. 
You can check out the clip below. More Mastodon articles 9 10 days ago, 20 comments 18 12 days ago, 21 comments 16 a month ago, 9 comments Trending stories 12 hours ago, 17 comments 17 13 hours ago, 64 comments 8 FINALLY I'll have some good music to do yoga to. 20 I swear to god if the name is Nothing.... 5 What if it's literal? It's just called "I can't say the title of the record" or maybe it's like the symbols album from KMFDM 4 Would it really kill you to type out what KMFDM means? This isnt twitter you dont have to abbreviate 5 words 0 PRSguitars87 130 · 6 hours ago · permalink · ↑ reply Not sure if you're being serious or not, but KMFDM is actually what the band goes by. Apparently it stands for "Kein Mehrheit Für Die Mitleid". When looking up music from the band though, you would use KMFDM. If you weren't serious then I guess I look like an idiot =) 5
